messages.content: Boris Johnson is not fit to be Prime Minister. He only cares about himself. And he won’t give a thought to what that will do to you, your family, our NHS and our family of nations. This is the man who lied to the Queen to get what he wants - he won't think twice about lying to you.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Recruit 20,000 more teachers and invest an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
Transform our mental health services with the same urgency as physical health.
Tackle the climate emergency by generating 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030.

mentions.candidate: Jo Swinson - Leader of the Liberal Democrats
mentions.tacticalSituation: A Liberal Democrat vote can beat Boris Johnson here - and deliver a brighter future.

issues.brexitEurope: We are the only party that can stop him from getting a majority to ram through his bad Brexit deal and take our country backwards.
issues.education: Recruit 20,000 more teachers and invest an extra £10 billion a year for schools.
issues.environment: Tackle the climate emergency by generating 80% of our electricity from renewables by 2030.
issues.health: Transform our mental health services with the same urgency as physical health.

quotes.text: The NHS is about as safe with [Boris Johnson and Michael Gove] as a pet hamster would be with a hungry python.
quotes.source: Former Conservative Prime Minister John Major

quotes.text: [Boris Johnson] is a compulsive liar who has betrayed every single person he has ever had any dealing with.
It’s the casual dishonesty, the cruelty, the betrayal; and, beneath the betrayal, the emptiness of real ambition: the ambition to do anything useful with office once it is attained.
quotes.source: Former Conservative MP Matthew Parris on Boris Johnson

quotes.text: Poll reveals majority believe lying Boris Johnson will sell off NHS services to US.
Boris Johnson lied to the Queen – in normal times no Prime Minister would survive this.
